Activity: Check emails and company communication channels. Review the final asset in Unreal Engine.
Create a simple animation for the asset to test its functionality and visual appeal in motion. This could involve a simple rotation or movement.
Review the animation and make any necessary adjustments. Ensure that the animation is smooth and consistent with the game's overall style.
Document the entire process of creating the asset, from blockout to final implementation in Unreal Engine. This documentation will be helpful for other team members and for future reference.
Upload the asset and documentation to the project repository. Ensure that all files are properly organized and labeled.
Begin researching and experimenting with new 3D modeling techniques or software. This will help stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and improve skills.
Complete documentation and project wrapping up. Browsing internet for entertainment.
